body: LEAD: Why is Elmont outside New York City, while St. Albans, on the other side of the city line, is in? Why did Douglaston become a part of the metropolis while the adjacent area called University Gardens remained part of Great Neck? title: The Editorial Notebook; The Ins and Outs of New York

body: LEAD: Prison work gangs began painting over graffiti on the Long Island Expressway yesterday morning and, a few hours later, Mayor Edward I. Koch announced that measure and others for removing - or at least obscuring - the spray-painted blanket that covers much of New York City.
